net.tridentsdk.api

Enum BlockFace

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<BlockFace>
      • net.tridentsdk.api.BlockFace
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<BlockFace>

    public enum BlockFace
extends java.lang.Enum<BlockFace>
    Represents an orientation towards a given direction set from a Vector
